summary: SummaryMAC's Squirt Plumping Lip Gloss Stick is a plumping lip gloss stick that nourishes and conditions lips with translucent color and shine.These oh-so-tingly (and so non-sticky!) shades glide on vibrant and melt down neutral for a nourished, polished, plumped-up pout. Glossy, juicy, plumpy!
details: DetailsBenefitsImparts a glassy shineNourishes, conditions and enhances appearance of lips​Instant plumping and visible volume with subtle tingling sensation​Leaves lips soft, smooth and healthy lookingFeaturesGet that voluptuous glow from the It-gloss you love - now in new naughty tints that plump lips with juicy, glossy color in a stickKey IngredientsGinger Root, Capsicum Extract & Menthol Crystals: Bring the heat and cools lips while serving up a subtle tingly sensation that provides instant plumping and visible volumeShea Butter, Coconut & Avocado Oil: Nourish, condition and impart glassy shineItem 2611052How To UseApply lip gloss to clean lips as desired or over Lipstick for a glossy effect.Pair with a Lip Pencil for instantly fuller-looking lips.WARNING: You may experience a tingle. If uncomfortable, discontinue use. Keep away from children.IngredientsDiisostearyl Malate, Polybutene, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Microcrystalline Wax\Cera Microcristallina\Cire Microcristalline, Synthetic Wax, Sodium Hyaluronate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Capsicum Frutescens Fruit Extract, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Oil, Menthoxypropanediol, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Menthol, Paraffin, Isohexadecane, Hydrogenated Coconut Oil, Vanillyl Butyl Ether, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Methyl Nicotinate, Tripeptide-1, Propylene Carbonate, Ethylene/Propylene Copolymer, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Xanthan Gum, Tin Oxide, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Vanillin, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Phenoxyethanol, [+/- Mica, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Bismuth Oxychloride (Ci 77163), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Bronze Powder (Ci 77400), Copper Powder (Ci 77400), Manganese Violet (Ci 77742), Red 6 (Ci 15850), Red 7 (Ci 15850), Red 21 (Ci 45380), Red 27 (Ci 45410), Red 28 (Ci 45410), Red 30 (Ci 73360), Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850), Red 22 Lake (Ci 45380), Red 28 Lake (Ci 45410), Red 30 Lake (Ci 73360), Red 33 Lake (Ci 17200), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (Ci 15985)]Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply lip gloss to clean lips as desired or over Lipstick for a glossy effect.Pair with a Lip Pencil for instantly fuller-looking lips.WARNING: You may experience a tingle. If uncomfortable, discontinue use. Keep away from children.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: i have bought this multiple times in several colors! It's so good

reviews.headline: I love it!
reviews.comments: Great lip product. Bought the shade Jet and it's perfect! Sheer black lippie. Nice lip feel and does last some time.

reviews.headline: Love the look once on!
reviews.comments: Adds little depth look to lips due to the color

reviews.headline: Violet Beta Purple
reviews.comments: I like the purple lipstick gloss only issue I have was when you turn it you cant turn it back the other way to bring it back down, so you have to be careful not to twist it to much.

reviews.headline: I like this product
reviews.comments: I am a more mature woman with thin lips experiencing fine lines around the lips.  I use a lip pencil for definition.  I use this gloss stick before the lip pencil as it helps the pencil flow better.  I have a clear one and one with a translucent color.  The only complaint I have is that with the extreme heat we have experienced this summer, it almost melted and I had to put it on with a lip brush.  I have since spoken with the MAC representative, and he told me I can put it in the refrigerator to solidify.

reviews.headline: I LOVE this product
reviews.comments: I love this product it works really well and I love the variety of colors

reviews.headline: Melted easily
reviews.comments: Would not buy again. It melted easily in a/c indoors. Did not work for purpose advertised.

reviews.headline: Love this lip!
reviews.comments: If youre looking for a subtle creamy lip thats close to chapstick, this is for you! I will say the plumping sensation is there but very minimal so dont get this if youre looking for plump!

reviews.headline: Amazing gloss!
reviews.comments: I love this formula much more than the MAC lip glass because it delivers that glossy wet look without that sticky feeling. I wish there were more regular colors but I'm happy with the two I own. Great formulas!

reviews.headline: Love thos
reviews.comments: Everything I wanted A little color a little plumping A whole lot of moisture! Win win

reviews.headline: WISH I BOUGHT SOONER!
reviews.comments: Girls get this while it is on sale!!! The dark brown matches the Quality lipglass so well and the application is actually easier imo.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: This product keeps my lips shiny and hydrated

reviews.headline: nice plump effect
reviews.comments: gives my lips a nice extra full look. i don't need to wear a lip liner to give full effect.

reviews.headline: Great
reviews.comments: Love this lip balm. I just pat a little bit on and it feels great onmy lips

reviews.headline: cute!
reviews.comments: I like the subtle color even though you'd think it's neon.  Bought all the colors for myself & all my girl friends, they also enjoyed them

reviews.headline: Mine wouldn't come out
reviews.comments: As much as I twisted, the product wouldnt come out. So I think I was able to use it for a week max. The subtle color is beautiful. Plumping is not too much, just right.

reviews.headline: Moist Lips, No Plump Magic
reviews.comments: This product gives you supple lips nice and moist does not burn, but absolutely no plumping and does not last long. Would not purchase again. Sorry MAC, this is WHACK

reviews.headline: Definitely would repurchase!!
reviews.comments: Love the smoothing action I get with this gloss stick! The consistency is a bit thinner than I expected, but a little goes a long way. It's not spicy either. The color payoff is subtle, which I prefer. I want more!

reviews.headline: Black gloss, I'm in love
reviews.comments:
The black shade is so beautiful! Its a subtle plump, minty no burning. Its not sticky but still a nice thicker gloss feel. A little does go a long way, no need to push alot out for application. It's alot softer than a chapstick so be careful, especially in warm climates.
I will absolutely be buying more!

reviews.headline: I would buy again!!
reviews.comments: Love it!!!!

media.headline: Mac Squirt plumping gloss stick
media.caption: Showing the color it's a must buy

faceoff_positive.comments:
I recently had the opportunity to try out the Mac Squirt Plumping Gloss Stick, and I must say, it has left a lasting impression on me. In terms of comparing it to other products I've tried, the Mac Squirt stands out for its unique plumping effect and smooth application. The gloss stick not only adds a lovely shine to my lips but also creates a subtle plumping effect, giving them a fuller appearance.

One of the major benefits of owning this product is its convenience. The gloss stick comes in a sleek and compact design, making it easy to carry in my purse or pocket. Its twist-up format eliminates the need for sharpening, making it hassle-free for on-the-go touch-ups. Additionally, the formula is moisturizing and long-lasting, providing hydration and a beautiful sheen to my lips throughout the day.

As for whether I would buy this product, I absolutely would. The Mac Squirt Plumping Gloss Stick has become a staple in my makeup routine, thanks to its impressive performance and noticeable plumping effect. I appreciate its high-quality formula and how it enhances the natural beauty of my lips.

When it comes to recommending this product to my friends and family, I wouldn't hesitate to do so. Whether they are looking to achieve fuller-looking lips or simply want a glossy finish, the Mac Squirt Plumping Gloss Stick is a versatile choice. Its comfortable wear and the variety of shades available make it suitable for a wide range of preferences and skin tones.

Overall, the Mac Squirt Plumping Gloss Stick is a standout product in its category. Its plumping effect, convenience, and high-quality formula make it worth the investment. I'm thoroughly impressed and confident in recommending it to others.
faceoff_positive.headline: Must Have !

faceoff_negative.comments: First off, the smell of the gloss is amazing sort of like cake but not too overbearing. But the downsides are that it is sort of like a stick of glue in that it's a bit sticky. So the feeling of it, especially on your mouth, can be uncomfortable. Additionally, it does a have a slight sheen/gloss but it's barely there which some may like. I did not mind. However, it has a purple tint which may look unappealing on a place like your mouth. People may see purple lips and think your sick or something. Lastly, it kind of melts when you put it onto your skin unlike lipstick, which kind of causes you to put on *too much product at once.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not worth it
